title: Canonical Orchestrator Verification & Activation
classification_description: PARTIALLY IMPLEMENTED - Schema exists, jobs registered, enabled=true, but execution loop NOT running

section_2_price_ingestion_orchestrators.query: SELECT * FROM fhq_governance.orchestrator_authority WHERE orchestrator_id LIKE '%Bulletproof%'
section_2_price_ingestion_orchestrators.finding: THREE price ingestion orchestrators REGISTERED and ENABLED

section_3_task_registry.query: SELECT * FROM fhq_governance.task_registry WHERE task_name ILIKE '%ingest%'
section_3_task_registry.finding: Ingestion tasks registered but NO SCHEDULE defined, assigned to LINE (not CEIO)

orchestrator_cycles.finding: ZERO cycles recorded - orchestrator has NEVER executed

agent_task_log.query: SELECT * FROM fhq_governance.agent_task_log WHERE task_name LIKE '%ingest%'
agent_task_log.finding: ZERO execution logs for ingest tasks

line_heartbeat.query: SELECT last_heartbeat FROM fhq_governance.agent_heartbeats WHERE agent_id = 'LINE'
line_heartbeat.finding: LINE agent last heartbeat 26 DAYS AGO - agent STALE

system_heartbeats.finding: Freshness monitoring EXISTS and detected BLACKOUT state

what_is_missing: Binding to CEIO (EC-009) - currently assigned to LINE
gap_analysis.root_cause: Orchestrator infrastructure is DEFINED but execution loop is NOT RUNNING

classification_rationale: Schema exists. Jobs registered. orchestrator_authority enabled. But: (1) No execution cycles, (2) No task schedules, (3) LINE agent stale, (4) Not bound to CEIO.
required_repair_actions: 1. Re-bind ingestion tasks from LINE to CEIO (EC-009)
5. Verify execution via orchestrator_cycles after activation

stig_attestation.statement: I, STIG (CTO), attest that price ingestion orchestration is PARTIALLY IMPLEMENTED (Classification D). The infrastructure exists and is enabled, but the execution loop is not running. This is a REPAIR scenario, not a creation scenario. No new schemas or orchestrators are required - only activation and binding.
